query: The Quiet Power of Post-Holiday Marketing Experiments

confidence.note: Directional evidence: 9 sources • 7 domains • 9 in-window / 0 background • support coverage 0%

title: The Quiet Power of Post-Holiday Marketing Experiments
highlights: Relevance beats volume: tailored cohort sends hold CPA and reduce unsubscribe vs blanket sitewide cuts [^3].
Partner-funded reach buys early-window share without the same margin hit as across-the-board discounts.
Store-as-studio events plus QR-linked offers convert footfall into measurable redemptions; aim for **≥5%** QR redemption of footfall.
executive_summary: You need to grow early-holiday sales and learn faster without collapsing margin or blasting customers with more irrelevant noise during the Nov 20 – Dec 04 window. This matters because the plan must drive **10–15%** foot-traffic uplift (stretch **≥25%**), lift early-window share from **12–15%** toward **20–30%**, keep event CPA ≤ **0.80× baseline**, and achieve QR redemptions of **≥5%** of footfall to validate learnings [^3][^8]. Favor a collab-led holiday approach: run partner-funded, co-branded micro-events and three cohort-targeted creatives instead of a blanket sitewide cut, and within 30 days Partnerships, CRM, and Stores must launch two co-branded events, instrument cohort-level conversion, event CPA and QR redemption, and treat the generic 20% off as the control to measure success [^3].
top_operator_moves: Stand up two partner-funded, co-branded micro-events in the Nov 20–Dec 04 window and assign paid-reach commitments from each partner.
Execute three cohort-specific offers (high-intent visitors, recent buyers, loyalty members) with one tailored creative per cohort and use the generic 20% sitewide as the control.
Instrument cohort-level conversion, event CPA, unsubscribe rate, and QR redemptions tied to footfall and report daily to Marketing and Stores for rapid iteration.

issues: Deep analysis summary exceeds sentence cap

scope.topic: The Quiet Power of Post-Holiday Marketing Experiments

unified_target_pack.paired_metric: Track buyer activity share vs promo intensity side by side

scope.operator_job_story: You need to grow early-holiday sales and learn faster without collapsing margin or blasting customers with more irrelevant noise during the Nov 20 – Dec 04 window.
search_shaped_variants: How do we move more holiday sales into the Nov 20–Dec 04 window without bigger discounts?
Test ideas to lift store footfall 10–15% and get QR redemptions ≥5% during the early holiday window
Which collaborator promos raise early-window share to 20% with event CPA ≤0.8x baseline?
What targeted offers preserve margin vs blanket sitewide cuts for Black Friday cadence?
scope.evidence_note: Directional evidence: 9 sources • 7 domains • 9 in-window / 0 background • support coverage 0%

pilot_spec.primary_move: Run a two-week early-holiday pilot that pairs three-cohort targeted sends, in-store QR activations, and brand co-promos to lift visits 10-15% while keeping event CPA at or below 0.8x baseline.

store_footfall_uplift.label: Store footfall uplift vs baseline
store_footfall_uplift.target_text: Lift visits 10-15% vs baseline during Nov 20  Dec 04 (baseline per M1).

early_window_share.label: Early-window buyer share
early_window_share.target_text: Increase buyers captured in Nov 20  Dec 04 to 20-30% of total holiday buyers.

event_cpa_multiplier.label: Event CPA vs baseline
event_cpa_multiplier.target_text: Keep event CPA at or below 0.8x baseline (ceiling).

qr_redemption_rate.label: QR redemption rate as share of incremental footfall
qr_redemption_rate.target_text: Achieve QR redemptions equal to at least 5% of incremental visits during the window.

Head of Retail: Activate the flagship pilot with in-store QR placements, track Store Footfall Uplift and Qr Redemption Rate daily, and stop any layout that reduces walk-to-QR visibility.
Head of Marketing: Execute the three-cohort precision sends and site personalization, report Early-window share vs promo intensity by cohort each week, and pause broad sitewide blasts if CPA or unsubscribe lift rises.
Head of Partnerships: Confirm partner co-promo mechanics and in-store creative this week and commit partner activation windows that map to Nov 20  Dec 04 to protect Event Cpa Multiplier.
Finance: Approve the two-week spend plan conditioned on Event Cpa Multiplier <= 0.8x baseline and set margin tolerances for any partner-funded discounts.
